title: Project-Based Education for Strengthening Co-Parenting Competencies in Prospective Parents

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories of child development and understanding of educational psychology
context.additional_context: Professional development program for pre-service or in-service teachers, linking mathematical pedagogy expertise with nurturing competencies as pre-service/in-service educators

learning_goals: Understand the core principles of co-parenting and apply them to real-life situations
Enhance conflict management and communication skills through role-division simulation projects
Analyze and provide feedback on self and peers' parenting attitudes using parenting behavior assessment tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
